attributes.action: Make back street breeding of dogs illegal.
attributes.additional_details: Because we have millions of dogs in dogs homes because they’re overbred and sold to unsuitable homes, leading to a lifetime of misery for many dogs and of course the dangers that come with badly bred dogs that are unsocialised, untrained and often end up destroyed. It’s cruel and completely unnecessary and so far, unregulated.
attributes.background: The government need to protect Dogs from being over bred and badly bred for money. It should be illegal to breed a dog without a license, proper health care and the registration of each pup with life time guarantee of responsibility & ownership from breeder if the buyer can no longer keep the pup.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petitions which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence
